titles.title: ko sun wa lati ma korin

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ko sun wa lati ma korin ti igbani
ogo f'olorun Halleluyah!
A le fi igbagbo korin na soke kikon ;
ogo f'oiorun Hallelujah!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
omo olorun ni eto lati
ma busayo
pe ona yi nye wa si
Okan wa nsaferi re
nigbose a o de afin oba wa ologo ;
ogo f ' olorun Hallelujah!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Awa nbe n' nu ibu ife to ra wa pada
Ogo f'olorun Halleluyah!
Awa y'o fi iye goke lo s'oke orun;
Ogo f'olorun Halleluyah!

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
Nibe a o korin titun tanu to da wa nde
Ogo f'olorun Halleluyah!
Nibe awon ayanfe yio korin 'yin kristi
Ogo f'olorun Halleluyah!
